IN RE the GUARDIANSHIP OF John T. ALDRICH, an Adult, Brock L. Aldrich, Appellant (Cross-Petitioner Below),
v.
Sandra Aldrich, Appellee (Petitioner Below). Court of Appeals Case No. 08A02-1704-GU-821 Court of Appeals of Indiana. FILED April 9, 2018

DISPOSITION OF CASE BY UNPUBLISHED MEMORANDUM DECISION

FRIEDLANDER , Sr.J. Affirmed. MATHIAS, J., Concurs.

CRONE, J., Concurs.
